casebody.data:
In re Estate of Mayer, Deceased.

[Cite as In re Estate of Mayer (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 390.]

(No. 94-797 Submitted December 20, 1994 Decided December 30, 1994.) Wasserman, Bryan, Landry & Honold, John A. Landry and John C. Wasserman, for appellees Gary Blumenthal, Warner Blumenthal and Walter Blumenthal. Eastman & Smith, James F. Nooney and John D. Willey, Jr., for appellant Jane Markwood.

Sua sponte, the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to that court for consideration of the appeal in light of Wright v. Bloom (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 596, 635 N.E.2d 31.

*391Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. A.W. Sweeney, J., dissents. Resnick, J., not participating.
